component.name: shareResources
component.description: Through the Share API, you can enable users take full advantage of this functionality within your application.

component.name: getNetworkUpdates
component.description: The Get Network Updates API returns the users network updates, which is the LinkedIn term for the user's feed. This call returns most of what shows up in the middle column of the LinkedIn.com home page, either for the member or the member's connections.
